column.text: 授权范置：1=本人 2=下属下级 3=所有下级

statements.statement:
select * from t_power_duties_module_config where 1=1 <#if query??> <#if query.key??> <#assign key = StringUtil.escapeSql(query.key)/> and ( module_code like '%${key}%' ) </#if>
<#if query.ids??> and id in (${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.ids)}) </#if>
<#if query.id??> and id = ${query.id} </#if>
<#if query.positionId??> and duties_id = ${query.positionId} </#if>
<#if query.moduleCode??> and module_code = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.moduleCode)}' </#if>
<#if query.level??> and level = ${query.level} </#if>
<#if query.levels??> and level in (${query.levels}) </#if> </#if>
